check_reachable_unseen.description: Finds all unseen tiles adjacent to reachable walkable tiles. Relies on verified traversable tile types from the notepad. Useful for clearing the exploration alert. Returns a list of coordinate dictionaries, or buttons if autopress_buttons is true.

autopress_buttons.description: If true and the tool returns a list of buttons, they will be pressed automatically.

history.commit_message: Refined traversable tiles to match verified mechanics in notepad and added object collision check.
Added FLOOR_UP_WALL to traversable tiles and updated description to clarify output.
Added WATER to traversable tiles to support exploration while surfing.
Fixing autopress_buttons logic to return a button array instead of coordinates when enabled.

battle_move_selector.description: Selects a move from the move selection menu in battle. Assumes the menu is open and the cursor is at the first move (index 0).

move_index.description: The 0-indexed position of the move to select (0-3).

battle_move_selector.python_script:
import json
move_index = int(input_data['move_index'])
# Add a longer sleep to ensure the move menu is fully open before directional inputs
buttons = ["sleep 500"] + (['Down'] * move_index) + ['A']
print(json.dumps(buttons))

history.commit_message: Added a sleep command to the start of the button sequence to ensure the move menu is fully open before directional inputs are applied. This prevents mis-navigation into the PACK menu.
Increased sleep time to 500ms to provide more buffer for the menu transition animation, preventing mis-navigation into the main menu options.

switch_pokemon_v1.description: Switches the active Pokémon to the one at the specified party index (0-5). Assumes the PKMN menu is open.

current_index.description: The 0-indexed position of the current cursor.

target_index.description: The 0-indexed position of the Pokémon to switch to (0-5).

history.commit_message: Refined switch_pokemon_v1 to ensure correct menu navigation by pressing directional buttons before selecting.
Refined switch_pokemon_v1 to take current_index as an argument to handle menu navigation from any starting position.
Fixed switch_pokemon_v1 to use input_data dictionary instead of json.loads(sys.argv[1]).

find_path_v4.description: Finds the shortest path to a target coordinate. Correctly handles walls, NPCs, and items. Returns an empty list if no path is found.

history.commit_message: Fixed find_path_v4: removed non-standard getparent() call and improved player position detection. Consolidated grid construction and BFS.
